Every night he mother tells a story of a worrier which is his father and a lso she remains him that he s not allowed to stay outside at night Because his grandfather the Moon King wants his one more eye. Kubo has a magical power that he can manipulate origami when he plays shamisen which is a traditional Japanese stringed instrument. One night there was a festival called Bon festival which has a ceremony where family members co mmunicate with deceased loved ones He tried talk to his father but he didn t get any response. After that night came the Moon King and his daughters which are Sisters of Kubo s mother started to hunt his one more eye. The mother protected her son but she died due to a battle Kubo was in deep grief but he decided to end this chase He started his journey with two strings for everyone who he loves.. An adventure heartwarming movie Easy to watch.

Kubo and the Two Strings was directed by Travis Knight This is a 3D step motion fantasy adventure film which means all of the c haracters were made of tons of cray and they put some visual effects on that afterwards That s why these characters look a bit different from those of computer anima ted films You can see their working behind the scenes during the end ing roll Anyway this is well depicted lots of Japanese traditional things like the festival clothes origami and Shamisen which are especially necessary for Kubo to live with Kinda relieved that there was not mistakes of Japanese traditions used in this film. My Brief Summary below. The boy named Kubo takes his late fa the r's revenges on his cruel grandpa and sister who killed him and tried to take kubo s eyes for their desperation that will become clear in the end but they ended up stealing only his left eye because of his father Hanzo So to complete their unfinished mission they chase off Kubo who on the other hand attempts to find the Armour to protect himself with animals. Although I wish this film had cooperated with a Japanese anime production glad that the Japanese traditions become more well known to people around the world than before thanks to this film. Although this ended up just being nominated and lost to Zootopia this is a wonderful and me aningful story.
